ballot_measures.number: Bailable Offenses and Substantial Risk Standard Amendment
ballot_measures.title: Bailable Offenses and Substantial Risk Standard Amendment
ballot_measures.description: Provide for the denial of bail when the accused is found to pose a substantial risk to another person

ballot_measures.number: Residency Requirements for City and Town Court Judges Amendment
ballot_measures.title: Residency Requirements for City and Town Court Judges Amendment
ballot_measures.description: Require city and town court judges to reside in either the county where the court is located or the bordering county closest to the court. This legislatively referred constitutional amendment is on the Indiana 2026 ballot.
